CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many stages are there in this funnel chart?

SRP.Q: Is the View Destination Info stage positioned above or below the Book Flight stage?
SRP.A: The View Destination Info stage is positioned {above} the Book Flight stage.

VPR.Q: What pattern does the data reduction follow in this funnel chart?
VPR.A: The data reduction follows a {exponential} pattern.

VE.Q: What is the value of stage Select Accommodation?
VE.A: The value of stage Select Accommodation is {1529}.

VE.Q: What is the value of stage View Destination Info?
VE.A: The value of stage View Destination Info is {2685}.

EVJ.Q: What is the maximum value in the funnel chart?
EVJ.A: The stage with the highest value is View Destination Info, with a value of {2685}.

EVJ.Q: What is the minimum value in the funnel chart?
EVJ.A: The stage with the lowest value is Check-in at Hotel, with a value of {422}.

SC.Q: How much did it decrease from stage Book Flight to stage Make Reservation?
SC.A: Decreased by {417} Thousand Tourists from stage Book Flight to stage Make Reservation.

SC.Q: How much did it decrease from stage Make Reservation to stage Travel to Destination?
SC.A: Decreased by {201} Thousand Tourists from stage Make Reservation to stage Travel to Destination.

NF.Q: In which stages of the funnel chart does the value exceed 2284? Please list the stage labels and corresponding values.
In which stages of the funnel chart does the value fall below 448? Please list the stage labels and corresponding values.
In which stages of the funnel chart does the value fall between 574 and 1706? Please list the stage labels and corresponding values.
NF.A: The {Select Accommodation} stage has {1529}, the {Book Flight} stage has {1092}, the {Make Reservation} stage has {675}.

NC.Q: Which reduction is greater: from stage Make Reservation to Travel to Destination, or from stage Select Accommodation to Book Flight?
NC.A: The reduction from stage {Select Accommodation} to {Book Flight} is greater.

NC.Q: Which reduction is the greatest: from stage Travel to Destination to Check-in at Hotel, from stage Search Travel Packages to Select Accommodation, or from stage Book Flight to Make Reservation?
NC.A: The reduction from stage {Book Flight} to stage {Make Reservation} is the greatest.

NC.Q: Which reduction is the greatest: from stage Make Reservation to Travel to Destination, from stage View Destination Info to Search Travel Packages, or from stage Select Accommodation to Book Flight?
NC.A: The reduction from stage {View Destination Info} to stage {Search Travel Packages} is the greatest.

MSR.Q: Between which two consecutive stages in the funnel chart is the conversion rate drop the largest?
MSR.A: The largest drop in conversion rate occurs between the {View Destination Info} and {Search Travel Packages} stages.

MSR.Q: Between which two consecutive stages in the funnel chart is the conversion rate drop the smallest?
MSR.A: The smallest drop in conversion rate occurs between the {Travel to Destination} and {Check-in at Hotel} stages.
